item.title: Solar System if Moon Was Only One Pixel
item.description: Saw this visualization long-back and was storing things up here(https://www.murarisumit.in/bookmarks/), now moving them up here now. Yes, there is lot of empty space in universe.

item.title: Video: A glimpse into ancient indian astronomy
item.description:
Astrology has always intrigued me, specifically indian style of astrology, have heard a lot about it. Lunar calendar and rituals and traditions around it always facinate me a lot. I have some longing for it.

Haven’t worked on it much, but this video again brings those question back to me.

Path for me is language first, will have to learn sanskrit first, then i would have lot of venues open to me.
